name: BuddeeAirconSmartPlug
0:
”Alexa, turn on aircon”
”Alexa, turn off aircon”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Allow Buddee users to link their existing Buddee Mobile App account with their Alexa device and invoke the command such as "Alexa, turn on Aircon" or "Alexa, turn off Aircon" to turn their Buddee SmartPlugs On or Off respectively
